GapFillInput.Title: The position of adverbs
GapFillInput.Instruction: Type a word or phrase from the word pool into each gap.

Content.Question:
1. Jane was perfectly aware that we wanted to queue up to buy tickets for the musical but she didn’t
turn up.
2. I had some sudden inspiration for my French dissertation on the way home.
3. This season our hockey team was plagued with injuries and we ended up bottom of our league.
4. Lisa and Chris have only been living in Barcelona for three months, and their son Liam can already hold a decent conversation in Spanish.
5. He’s a romantic hero, but he’s a flawed character. Still, you can’t help being attracted to him!
6. I have yet to see whether or not the new sales training actually increases our monthly
sales figures.
7. My brother hardly ever goes to the shops. He does most of his shopping on the Internet.
8. We’ve been happily married for nearly forty years.
9. Jen and Pietro probably won’t go to New York next month as the flights are too expensive.
10. The company have frequently looked at local gyms to see if they can get reduced membership for
their employees.
